memories.content: User asking about removing Vite and running only on Next.js. Need to check current project setup to understand what's currently configured.
memories.context: Project analysis for build tool optimization

memories.content: Project uses Next.js for main app with Vite only for testing via Vitest. Vite dependencies: vitest, @vitejs/plugin-react used only for test runner. Next.js handles all production builds. Safe to keep current setup as Vite serves different purpose (testing vs production).
memories.context: Analysis of current build tool configuration

memories.content: User has a stoic-zenith subdirectory with separate Vite project that's failing. They're in wrong directory - should be in main project root, not stoic-zenith subfolder.
memories.context: User navigation error - running Vite project instead of Next.js

memories.content: Converting stoic-zenith Vite project to Next.js to match main project structure. Need to analyze current setup first.

Successfully converted stoic-zenith from Vite to Next.js. Created Next.js pages structure, removed Vite configs, updated package.json. Server starts successfully on localhost:3000. Migration complete.
memories.context: Successful Vite to Next.js migration completion

memories.content: Need to replace react-router-dom with Next.js Link components. Found usage in AppSidebar.tsx that needs conversion to Next.js navigation.
memories.context: Post-migration cleanup - removing React Router dependencies

memories.content: Fixed react-router-dom imports by converting NavLink to Next.js Link and useLocation to usePathname. Created Next.js not-found.tsx page. Migration cleanup complete.
memories.context: Completed react-router-dom to Next.js navigation migration
